main event: An observer saw a bright light above the horizon that suddenly moved rapidly up, accelerating sharply to incredible speed, changed course and direction, and disappeared within seconds.
interesting points: The object seemed to change in size and intensity during the sighting.
Other observers in the area had reported similar sightings of a defined, triangular-shaped aircraft of unknown origin.
The observer noted the incredible acceleration and disappearance of the object within seconds as rather unusual.
The object was observed from a public school in Ganado, Arizona.
The observer was unable to positively identify the object but believed it was not of earthly origin.
sighted object: a bright light that accelerated rapidly and changed direction
